title: Truck attack in NYC
author: VD
content_html:
The attack truck problem has crossed the Atlantic:

At least six people are dead and more than a dozen were injured after a truck mowed down people on a bike path in New York City Tuesday.

The incident happened just after 3 p.m. ET on the bike path that runs along the West Side Highway in Lower Manhattan.

The NYPD said a truck entered the West Street pedestrian/bike path a few blocks north of Chambers Street. It proceeded to strike multiple people on the path.

Multiple fatalities and injuries are reported, though a senior law enforcement source said at least six are dead and 15 are injured.

Well, it’s just part and parcel of life in a major city with open immigration. The innocent driver of the killer truck, whose motives remain unknown, was from Uzbekistan. Sadly, it appears the Magic Dirt failed again.

New York City truck driver in terror attack is 29-year-old Uzbek national who has lived in the US for 8 years most recently in Tampa.

Eight years. And yet people usually start describing immigrants as “real Americans” after five.

Terror suspect was a ‘very friendly’ Uzbek immigrant who drove for Uber.

But they’re such nice, hard-working people! More American than Americans!
